description: A lovely warming, nutritious soup for the cooler months, using the wholesome grain, pearl barley.
name: Beef Barley and Vegetable Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g cubed beef  about 3 cm in size
3 cloves garlic, smashed and finely chopped
2 tbs parsley, chopped  can use dried

recipeInstructions.text: Into a large non stick Pot on high heat, add one teaspoon of Olive Oil, add half of the Beef, brown on all sides quickly for about 3 minutes, remove to a plate and repeat with last of the Beef.
Reduce heat to medium, add the last teaspoon of Olive Oil, add Onion, Garlic and Carrots. Cook stirring constantly for about 4 minutes or until veggies have softened slightly.
Add Cinnamon, and cook stirring for about a minute or until fragrant.
Add Stock, Water and Worcestershire Sauce, bring to boil, reduce heat to simmer, return Beef back into the Pot, along with any juices. Lid on, simmer for 45 minutes or until Beef is just tender.
Add Pearl Barley and Potatoes, return to simmer, cook uncovered for 40 minutes or until Barley is cooked and tender.
Check Seasoning, add Parsley and one last stir.
Serve into bowls and top with additional Parsley if desired.Enjoy.
